ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: Stuart: May I send you a few pictures? Perhaps that will convince you that no one can tank a spectre. To put it simply, one must Ensnare or Darkness the
ygData.messageBody:
Stuart:

May I send you a few pictures? Perhaps that will convince you that no one
can tank a spectre. To put it simply, one must Ensnare or Darkness the
creature and run around until it is as dead as possible, then going oom
before you engage. No matter what armor you got and how many HP you have,
the spectre is still going to hit for 60, 70, 50, 80 in one round. Now, how
many of those rounds can 1000HP take?
I cannot disagree or agree with you on 'higher strength = higher damage'
because it has not been proven yet. Do you use an Ogre or a Troll? If so,
what level are you? What damage do you do? And what weapon do you use?
Please email me personally concerning the picture and your stats at
hchan@... ; that is, if you wish to do so.
